data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Osh (city) access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary: On average, 49 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 605 believers in the state of Osh (city).
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 200,000 people living in Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Azerbaijani people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Azerbaijani people know you.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Osh (city), Kyrgyzstan. Please, stir the 605 believers here to pray for awakening.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Osh (city) to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Osh (city)
location.people_groups_list: Kalmyk-Oirat, Pashtun, Northern, Bashkir, Kyrgyz, Lyuli
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalmyk-Oirat (3,700), Pashtun, Northern (600), Bashkir (900), Kyrgyz (4,698,000), Lyuli (500)
